title: Spicy prawns and pasta
ingredients: ['500g vermicelli pasta', '7 tablespoons butter', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', 'hot pepper sauce, to taste', 'green chilli sauce, to taste', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon fines herbs', '1 bay leaf', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '500g large prawns, peeled and deveined', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
